div.p:
Let's bring more of our forces into battle. By using groups, we
can issue commands to more than one ship and place them

To group some ships, we simply left-click and drag a box
around them, then click the "Group button". Let's group our

entire fleet. Now we can order our fleet to close
and overwhelm the enemy.

Victory is ours! The enemy have been broken and sunk.
We're free to plunder the spoils.
